text: Hey, {name}. Your class {course_name} is starting {how_to_join}. You are receiving this notification because you are registered for the course. Please call us at {company_phone} if you have any questions. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

email.subject: {course_name} class starting
email.body:
Hey, {name},

This is {company_name}. Your class {course_name} is starting {how_to_join}. You are receiving this notification because you are registered for the course. Please call us at {company_phone} if you have any questions. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Respectfully,

{company_name}

P: {company_phone}

E: {company_email}
